1.title: The Walking Dead

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Lee Everett is being arrested for a crime when the Walking Dead emerge.

2.title: Clementine

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Lee tries to find clues as to what is going on and finds Clementine, a young girl, hiding in a tree house.

3.title: The Farm

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Lee and Clementine arrive at a farm and join them to hide from the zombie apocalypse.

4.title: Oh Brother, My Brother

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Lee, Clementine, and others are trapped in a convenience store when Lee finds a zombie that looks familiar.

5.title: Infected

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Lee, Clementine, and others arrive at a Motel that has other humans, who are found to be infected.

6.title: Surviving

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Lee and others take shelter at the motel, until things go horribly wrong.

7.title: No Good Deed

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: When Lee finds a group of kids in trouble in the forest, he helps, only for it to comer back and bite him.

8.title: Sour Milk

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Lee and others travel to a dairy farm, where there are more things than just sour milk.

9.title: Barn Diaries

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Lee investigates a Barn at the dairy farm and learns disturbing things.

10.title: Prisoners

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Lee and others become prisoners on the dairy farm and need to escape before becoming dinner for the cannibals.

11.title: Escape

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: In a last ditch effort, Lee and others try to escape the deadly dairy farm.

12.title: The Streets

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: After escaping the dairy farm, Lee and the other survivors are desperate for food and shelter.

13.title: Bandits

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Bandits attack the motel Lee and the others are staying and take some people hostage.

14.title: Nightmares

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Lee dreams about horrific future events.

15.title: Dealing

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: The group must make difficult decisions with some members of the group.

16.title: Roadblocks

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: The group hits a roadblock on the train and must find a way around.

17.title: Decisions

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Lee and the group need to fast track out of there on the train with massive floods of zombies pouring in.

18.title: Flood

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: The group escapes a flood of zombies in the new town and tries to hide in a new house.

19.title: Red Riding Hood

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: The group must split into groups to find supplies and other materials.

20.title: The Dead Sea

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Lee heads to the sewers to find his way back to the group.

21.title: Crawford

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Lee and the group infiltrate Crawford.

22.title: Falling

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Escaping Crawford is not going to be easy.

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

24.title: Time to Turn

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Lee deals with what to do after being infected.

25.title: Boating

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: The group goes searching for the boat to try and get back to Clementine.

26.title: Broken

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Still dealing with having only one arm, Kenny, Ben and Lee venture for another way out.

27.title: Become One

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: Lee finds where Clementine is being held, but will he get to her before fully turning into a zombie?

28.title: I Love You, My Darling Clementine

episode of.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: Lee turns into a zombie, leaving Clementine alone with a difficult choice.

imdb.plot outline: The Walking Dead is set in the same universe as Robert Kirkman's award-winning comic book series. Lee Everett, a convicted criminal, who has been given a second chance at life in a world devastated by the undead. With corpses returning to life and survivors stopping at nothing to maintain their own safety, protecting an orphaned girl named Clementine may offer him redemption in a world gone to hell.
imdb.title: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett
akas: The Walking Dead: Lee Everett (United States)
plot: An Adventure Horror set in the same universe as Robert Kirkman's award-winning comic book series.::Telltale Games
